description: Damian Taylor"The Decimator"Ht: 5'7" WT: 150lbs Season W/L record ( 0-1)Doug Acre"The Destroyer"Ht: 5'6" WT: 150lbsSeason W/L record (1-0)Returning to the mat is the big dick all-american wrestler Doug "The Destroyer" Acre. Doug won his first match against Dominic "The Dominator" Pacifico and he's planning on continuing his reign. The military badass Damian "The Decimator" Taylor doesn't care if Doug won his first match or not, he's determined to take his ass down to the mat and fuck him senseless after he wins. The rounds heat up quick as The Destroyer slams Damian to the mat and locks him in a leg cradle. The Decimator gets pissed and throws Doug to the ground, shoving his balls right in The Destroyer's face. Both guys have their eyes set on victory, will The Decimator have the determination and drive to beat his big dick opponent or will his ass get "Destroyed" by Doug's monster cock?
title: Damian "The Decimator" Taylor vs Doug "The Destroyer" Acre
